commitments.commitment: Answer questions on Discord, Telegram or YouTube comments
commitments.quote: I'm happy to answer Any questions on Discord, Telegram or the YouTube comments of this video

open_questions.question: How can AI development be improved to be less centralized?
open_questions.context: Current AI development is often centralized, limiting participation and transparency

open_questions.question: How can more people globally contribute to solving complex AI problems and building better AI?
open_questions.context: Motivation behind Game of Prompts platform

key_facts.fact: Service packaging process can take like 20 minutes
